page.title: 13A Day at Cannington School
page.content: I leave home at 8.30am for school and call for some friends on the way. When we get to school we mess around in the playground. School starts at 9.00am. We do mental arithmetic and at 9.20am we have assembly. When we come back from assembly we do maths until break; break is from 10.40am_10.55am. Then we go into class again until 12.10pm when dinner break begins. We go into dinner at 12.30pm. Break finishes at 1.10pm. After dinner we do group work. When we do group work we split into 5 groups of 6 or 7 children. Each group works on a differant subject, these subjects are Science,Maths, History, Art and Individual Topic. At 2.10 we have another break of 15 minutes. Then our teacher reads us a story. Our presant story is called "Good Night Mr.Tom" which is about a war refugee.
